MainPage.Title: PAW ~ Search Avatars
MainPage.Subheader: Use the toggle to switch between searching by avatar name, description, author ID or AI.
MainPage.AvatarsNotFound: No avatars found. Try a different search term or platform combination.
MainPage.SearchText: Enter a search term to find VRChat avatars.

Privacy.Title: Your Privacy Matters
Privacy.Description: Welcome to PAW! Here's how we protect your privacy:
Privacy.LocalScanningDesc: PAW scans your VRChat output logs and amplitude cache file locally on your device to find avatar IDs you've encountered. Only these IDs are submitted to our servers.
Privacy.DataStorageDesc: When you log in, your account information is never sent to PAW servers. All your personal data is stored and used exclusively on your device.
Privacy.PrivacyFirstDesc: We believe in transparency. Your VRChat account credentials and personal information remain completely private to you.

ClosePAW.title: Success
ClosePAW.Message: PAW will now close. You will need to relaunch.

SimilarAvatars.Description: Click on any node to see details and fetch similar avatars. Drag to pan.
SimilarAvatars.AddedSimilarAvatars: Added {count} similar avatars to the graph.
SimilarAvatars.ClickNode: Click on a node to see avatar details and find similar avatars
